attributes.action: Consider rebates for student accommodation whilst lockdown is in place
attributes.additional_details: My daughter started at uni we are paying over 600 pounds a month for accommodation she does not need when she cannot access a. Amped and all her learning is online - we are being ripped off
attributes.background: Consider reviewing contracts on university accommodation fees before private litigation takes over and private law firms cease on this opportunity

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285
